prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Piano, Organ, Guitar, but without Synth Lead.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Bass, Drums, Piano, Organ, and Guitar, but no Synth Lead.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Drums, Piano, Organ, and Guitar, but no Synth Lead.

Style 3:
This song is made up of Bass, Drums, Piano, Organ, and Guitar, omitting the Synth Lead.
